email_body: Monday it is From: John J Lavorato/ENRON@enronXgate on 02/21/2001 06:27 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: RE: Yes -----Original Message----- From: Arnold, John Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 5:41 PM To: Lavorato, John Subject: Are you free for drinks either Monday or Wednesday?
